body_html:
Base commit in 9d03824. There's still a lot of work left to be done, of course—it's not very useful yet.

Froskekongen: I don't know of any detailed analysis of float16 versus fixed16; it's probably going to be dependent on a number of factors including your model and compilation flags. TensorFlow supports quantized models for inference, but as far as I know not training them.
body_text:
Base commit in 9d03824. There's still a lot of work left to be done, of course—it's not very useful yet.
Froskekongen: I don't know of any detailed analysis of float16 versus fixed16; it's probably going to be dependent on a number of factors including your model and compilation flags. TensorFlow supports quantized models for inference, but as far as I know not training them.
body:
Base commit in 9d03824d6740be0c043c431566c917ec0cf6cf3f. There's still a lot of work left to be done, of course—it's not very useful yet.

Froskekongen: I don't know of any detailed analysis of float16 versus fixed16; it's probably going to be dependent on a number of factors including your model and compilation flags. TensorFlow supports quantized models for inference, but as far as I know not training them.
